mapper.insert: insert into QUESTION(category, id, title, content, original_filename, store_filename, image_url) VALUES (#{category}, #{id}, #{title}, #{content}, #{originalFilename}, #{storeFilename}, #{imageUrl})
mapper.select: SELECT no, category, views, id, title, content, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate, original_filename AS originalFilename, store_filename AS storeFilename, image_url AS imageUrl FROM QUESTION WHERE no = #{no}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT a.*, rownum rnum FROM ( SELECT no, category, views, id, title, content, create_date AS createDate, update_date AS updateDate FROM QUESTION
WHERE 1=1
AND category != 10
AND category = #{searchCond.category}
AND title LIKE '%' || #{searchCond.keyword} || '%'
AND content LIKE '%' || #{searchCond.keyword} || '%'
AND (title LIKE '%' || #{searchCond.keyword} || '%' OR content LIKE '%' || #{searchCond.keyword} || '%')
ORDER BY no DESC ) a WHERE rownum <= #{pagination.start} + #{pagination.size} ) WHERE rnum > #{pagination.start}
